metadata.feature_description: Test URL generation for specific pages with custom parameters and query strings

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test URL generation for existing page

steps.action: Navigate to SEO > URL Management > TEST URL tab
steps.expected: TEST URL tab should display with page selection and URL testing options
steps.actual: TEST URL tab displayed with Page to Test dropdown, Query String field, Custom Page Name field, and Test URL button

steps.action: Click on Page to Test dropdown and select 'Home' page
steps.expected: Dropdown should show available pages in hierarchical tree
steps.actual: Dropdown displayed 23 pages in tree structure with expandable folders

steps.action: Click Test URL button with Home page selected
steps.expected: Generated URLs for the Home page should appear in Resulting URLs field
steps.actual: Three URLs generated for different locales: http://localhost:8081/, http://localhost:8081/en-us/, http://localhost:8081/es-es/

steps.action: Select 'Our Products' page and enter 'my-custom-page' in Custom Page Name field
steps.expected: Custom page name should be appended to generated URLs
steps.actual: URLs generated with custom page name appended: http://localhost:8081/Our-Products/my-custom-page, http://localhost:8081/en-us/Our-Products/my-custom-page, http://localhost:8081/es-es/Our-Products/my-custom-page

steps.action: Enter 'category=electronics&sort=price' in Add Query String field and click Test URL
steps.expected: Query string should be appended to generated URLs
steps.actual: URLs generated with query string: http://localhost:8081/Our-Products?category=electronics&sort=price for each locale variant

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test special character handling in custom page names

steps.action: Enter 'test@page#name$special' in Custom Page Name field and click Test URL
steps.expected: System should handle special characters appropriately
steps.actual: System generated unfriendly URL format when special characters present: ~/OurProducts/tabid/22/test@page#name$special - This shows the system falls back to a non-friendly URL format when special characters are used

steps.action: Enter 'http://localhost:8081/en-us/Our-Products' in URL to Test field and click Test URL Rewriting
steps.expected: System should analyze the URL and show rewriting details
steps.actual: System correctly identified: Rewriting Result: Default.aspx?TabId=22&language=en-US, Identified Language: en-US, Identified Page: Our Products, Operation Messages: ActiveTab: 22/Our Products IsSecure: False

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify generated URL format and validity

steps.action: Review all generated URLs across tests
steps.expected: URLs should be properly formatted with correct structure
steps.actual: All friendly URLs followed correct format: protocol://domain/locale/page-path with optional query strings. URLs properly handled multiple locales (en-us, es-es) and portal aliases

observations: The TEST URL feature is located under SEO > URL Management > TEST URL tab, not under a separate URL Management menu
When special characters (@, #, $) are used in custom page names, the system falls back to generating unfriendly URLs with tabid parameters (e.g., ~/OurProducts/tabid/22/) instead of friendly URLs
The URL generation automatically creates URLs for all configured portal aliases and locales
The TEST URL REWRITING feature provides detailed debugging information including the internal rewriting result, identified culture, identified page, and operation messages
